channel.title: NEED mentor/helper
channel.description: can somebody mentor me? i want to make a 562+ server but i just cant figure this out! i've tried plenty different sources and none of them work, so im throwing up my hands and asking for help.... Please help me <3

item.title: NEED mentor/helper
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

If you want to actually learn how to code just check the tutorial in my signature. When you encounter issues, or am not sure what to do, post here. If you have troubles setting up the server, post here.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED mentor/helper
item.dc:creator: @zero380 zero380
item.description:
@zero380 wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:12, topic:405131”][quote author=zero380 link=topic=502132.msg3673757#msg3673757 date=1311114118]
exactally… this kid is just being a friken dunce… requesting help is the same thing as asking for help… fken retard!

if the world was like that where people were smart asses about words i’d kill myself
[/quote]

Actually, I understand what he means … you’re not allowed ask for long-term help, only post questions to do with errors and different things like that. Read the rules[/quote]

he’s still a smart ass lol

Read full topic

item.title: NEED mentor/helper

item.title: NEED mentor/helper
item.dc:creator: @zero380 zero380
item.description:
@zero380 wrote:

im not new to coding as a whole, iv just never done anything above a 317 and needed some help… one big thing also… i learned how to do stuff with 317 but couldnt figure how to change ip and whatnot so other ppl can play it

Read full topic

item.title: NEED mentor/helper
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

i can help you.
i’m an amatuer coder and have successfully started a 525. iknow you want 562+ but you’re probs better off starting lower.
like the posts above said, it’s best to start with a 317 and just look around the folders in there. pm me.

i dont see whats wrong with offering help.

Read full topic

can somebody mentor me? i want to make a 562+ server but i just cant figure this out! i’ve tried plenty different sources and none of them work, so im throwing up my hands and asking for help… Please help me <3
